CmdLine: (     set -eux;     export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive;     DOCKER_PLUGIN_URL=https://codeload.github.com/signalfx/docker-collectd-plugin/tar.gz/4454b92f7083ace85dddd583b3697e5e71ad23a7;     echo "deb http://ftp.debian.org/debian jessie-backports main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list;     apt-get update;     apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends make curl;     apt-get install -t jessie-backports -y --no-install-recommends collectd collectd-core;     mkdir -p /usr/share/collectd/docker-collectd-plugin;     curl -s -o- $DOCKER_PLUGIN_URL | tar -xz --strip-components 1 -C /usr/share/collectd/docker-collectd-plugin -f-;     pip install -r /usr/share/collectd/docker-collectd-plugin/requirements.txt; )
Commands.Name: run
